channel.title: Bank Freezes
channel.description:
http://puu.sh/5gRvx.png
Everytime I click on my bank gives me this error, and freezes my client having to reload it.

item.title: Bank Freezes
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“Barrickz, post:1, topic:535569”]http://puu.sh/5gRvx.png

Everytime I click on my bank gives me this error, and freezes my client having to reload it.[/quote]

If the bank panel shows up, its an item cache problem. If it doesnt, and just freezes right away, then you have the wrong source for your client. (or vice versa)

Read full topic

item.title: Bank Freezes
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

I’ve had this before,it’s probably you spawned to many stackables in your items…like you have 20 items that have 2.1b stacked in your bank.Then it would freeze your client when you try to click on your bank.OR! It’s something with your cache.
What did you add before your bank freezed? or did you download a source and click on the bank and just freeze?
There was another reason for this,but I forgot what it was that happened for me.I think erm,something with adding a new bank interface,well i don’t remember lol.

Read full topic
